sources.title: Up in the Air (1940)
sources.description: A none-too-popular (nor good) radio singer, Rita Wilson is murdered while singing on the air in a radio studio. Radio page boy, Frankie Ryan, and his janitor pal, Jeff, solve the mystery for the none-too-sharp police. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/up-in-the-air-1940/

sources.title: Up in the Air (1940) MANTAN MORELAND
sources.description:
Stars: Frankie Darro, Marjorie Reynolds, Mantan Moreland 
 Director: Howard Bretherton

 A none-too-popular (nor good) radio singer, Rita Wilson is murdered while singing on the air in a radio studio. Radio page boy, Frankie Ryan, and his janitor pal, Jeff, solve the mystery for the none-too-sharp police.

sources.title: Up in the Air
sources.description: Murder mystery at a radio station. Movie features Mantan Moreland and Frankie Darro along with Marjorie Reynolds and Lorna Gray.

metadata.Plot: A none-too-popular (nor good) radio singer, Rita Wilson is murdered while singing on the air in a radio studio. Radio page boy, Frankie Ryan, and his janitor pal, Jeff, solve the mystery for the none-too-sharp police.
metadata.Actors: Frankie Darro, Marjorie Reynolds, Mantan Moreland
